PROPERTY DEMO：block/inline center

  • 一覧に戻る

block/inline center

HTML

CSS

.block {
    width: 200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    background-color: #ccc;
}
.inline{
    dispaly: inline;
    text-align: center;
}
.inline-block{
    display: inline-block;
    text-align: center;
}
